physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 4 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#442 Mann and Weinberger Families, 1900-46." On back of photograph: "25th Anniversary, Ethel & Joe Mann, June 6, 1936, #442(d)."

mods.abstract: Printed material, possibly a program, from Ethel and Joe Mann's 25th wedding anniversary. Some wording is cut off in the picture, what can be read says: "She has had music, featuring Joe Mann and His Band of Friends." Created by Marvin Slatkin
mods.note: Donated by Mr. and Mrs. Schoen
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
